document_name_accent: viem bao hoat dich khop co chan.json
subsection_content:
Ankle synovitis occurs due to many different causes, including: (2)
Excessive exercise or repetitive movements such as walking, running, jumping... puts pressure on the ankle joint.; Practicing sports, especially climbing high but not warming up thoroughly before.; Wearing ill-fitting shoes, high heels... puts pressure on the ankles, the condition will only get worse if this habit is not changed.; Infection caused by Staphylococcus Aureus, Streptococci or some harmful fungi.; The ankle joint has been injured before.; Pathology: gout, rheumatoid arthritis...; Ankle injury or strong impact.
The danger elements:
The body is often exposed to cold weather and low temperature environments; The patient has a history of ankle capsulitis; Participate in sports that require a lot of contact (soccer, basketball...).; People who often have to stand continuously for many hours such as working in sales, security, etc.

subsection_data:
viem bao hoat dich khop co chan.json. Causes of ankle synovitis
Ankle synovitis occurs due to many different causes, including: (2)
Excessive exercise or repetitive movements such as walking, running, jumping... puts pressure on the ankle joint.; Practicing sports, especially climbing high but not warming up thoroughly before.; Wearing ill-fitting shoes, high heels... puts pressure on the ankles, the condition will only get worse if this habit is not changed.; Infection caused by Staphylococcus Aureus, Streptococci or some harmful fungi.; The ankle joint has been injured before.; Pathology: gout, rheumatoid arthritis...; Ankle injury or strong impact.
The danger elements:
The body is often exposed to cold weather and low temperature environments; The patient has a history of ankle capsulitis; Participate in sports that require a lot of contact (soccer, basketball...).; People who often have to stand continuously for many hours such as working in sales, security, etc.
